T04santbciu:279: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu Bca_6.121c

T04santbciu:486: evaṃ ca ko guṇo labdhaś Bca_9.30c

T04santbciu:587: kaluṣaṃ sve hṛdaye karoti yaśca Bca_1.34b
T04santbciu:638: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā Bca_9.153c
T04santbciu:672: kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā Bca_9.79a
T04santbciu:742: kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet Bca_9.152b
T04santbciu:753: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā Bca_9.153a
T04santbciu:775: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughā Bca_6.125c
T04santbciu:824: ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt Bca_9.154d
T04santbciu:1052: jātaṃ saṃbodhicittaṃ sakalajanaparitrāṇamātā dayā ca Bca_10.13d
T04santbciu:1080: jñeyaṃ vinā tu kiṃ vetti Bca_9.61c
T04santbciu:1194: tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ Bca_9.88d
T04santbciu:1245: taptā ca bhūḥ sphāṭikakuṭṭimaṃ syāt Bca_10.8b
T04santbciu:1381: te mānino vijayinaśca ta eva śūrā Bca_7.59a
T04santbciu:1386: teṣāṃ sa eva hetuḥ syān Bca_3.15c
T04santbciu:1387: teṣu kopo na yukto me Bca_6.39c
T04santbciu:1399: trastāḥ paśyantvakasmādiha yamapuruṣāḥ kākagṛdhrāśca ghorāḥ Bca_10.11a
T04santbciu:1542: dṛṣṭvāgre mañjughoṣaṃ bhavatu kalakalaḥ sāṃprataṃ nārakāṇām Bca_10.14d
T04santbciu:1545: dṛṣṭvā prāmodyavegād vyapagataduritā yāṃtu tenaiva sārdham Bca_10.11d
T04santbciu:1605: dhvāntaṃ dhvastaṃ samantāt sukharatijananī kasya saumyā prabheyam
T04santbciu:1626: na kleśā viṣayeṣu nendriyagaṇe nāpyantarāle sthitā Bca_4.47a
T04santbciu:1633: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ Bca_9.80c
T04santbciu:1651: na ca sneho na ca dveṣas Bca_8.181c
T04santbciu:1653: na cātra me vyayaḥ kaścit Bca_5.78a
T04santbciu:1668: na jñātāḥ kva gatā iti Bca_8.20d
T04santbciu:1672: na tu buddhaiḥ samāḥ kecid Bca_6.116c
T04santbciu:1684: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti Bca_6.3c
T04santbciu:1694: na putro na pitā yataḥ Bca_9.65b
T04santbciu:1710: na mado na ca vismayaḥ Bca_8.109b
T04santbciu:1711: na mado na ca vismayaḥ Bca_8.116b
T04santbciu:1717: na miśraṃ na pṛthak kvacit Bca_9.104b
T04santbciu:1741: na vimocyaṃ hi sadaiva bodhicittaṃ Bca_1.8d
T04santbciu:1743: na śastraṃ na viṣaṃ nāgnir Bca_8.84a
T04santbciu:1746: na śiṃghānaṃ na ca śleṣmā Bca_9.58c
T04santbciu:1747: na śurā na ca te prājñāḥ Bca_4.28c
T04santbciu:1762: na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ Bca_6.114b
T04santbciu:1770: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ Bca_7.1c
T04santbciu:1785: nāto 'nyatra kuhasthitāḥ punarime mathnanti kṛtsnaṃ jagat Bca_4.47b
T04santbciu:1828: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na ca snāyur Bca_9.60a
T04santbciu:1829: nāhaṃ vasā na ca svedo Bca_9.59a
T04santbciu:1933: noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ Bca_9.79d
T04santbciu:2322: bhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca na priyam Bca_8.96b
T04santbciu:2502: mā pāpī mā ca rogitaḥ Bca_10.41b
T04santbciu:2698: yadi tiṣṭhati kutaḥ sukhaṃ mama Bca_4.35d
T04santbciu:2812: yāvanna śatrava ime nihatāḥ samakṣaṃ Bca_4.36b

T04santbciu:2851: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrā Bca_6.122a

T04santbciu:2885: ratnāni yāvanti ca santi loke Bca_2.2c

T04santbciu:3312: sarvaṃ yasyānubhāvād vyasanamapagataṃ prītivegāḥ pravṛttāḥ Bca_10.13c
